message:
SYSTEM: Dev8d_summary.pdf: Página 17
Microsoft Zentity
• Microsoft Zentity is repository platform with services 
around it
• Has a hierarchy for the management of a research group: 
entities like publications, thesis, papers
• Everything is an object
• First thing: learn power shell for develop anything in 
Zentity
• We add resources (me, my papers, etc) and we get them 
developing code
• It uses LINQ (Language-Integrated Query) for 
accessing resources.
speaker: SYSTEM
